programme.subtitle: Time for a Story
programme.desc: Railway adventures. The Fat Controller announces that the library is holding a story time for the children and he needs an engine to deliver the storybooks.
programme.title: Thomas and Friends

programme.subtitle: Sir Spotty Wot
programme.desc: In this episode DottyWot has her heart set on becoming a knight, and sets out to find herself a dragon at the zoo.
programme.title: The WotWots

programme.desc: Animation. When Frankie breaks down on the way to a fire, he blames his age. But his pride is restored in time for him to enjoy his 15th anniversary party.
programme.title: City of Friends

programme.subtitle: Inventor Bello
programme.desc: Animated adventures. Bello meddles with Mina's latest creation, a giant robot for changing light bulbs.
programme.title: Jelly Jamm

programme.subtitle: Sports Day
programme.desc: Animated series about a lovable little pig. It is Sports Day at Peppa's playgroup and lots of special events are due to take place.
programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.subtitle: Hebaa's Wool
programme.desc: Farmer can't persuade Hebaa to let her have some of his precious wool for her mattress. Leonard might be more successful, but his mattress wants stuffing too.
programme.title: Castle Farm

programme.subtitle: I Want to Sing
programme.desc: Regal larks. There is a singing competition in the Kingdom and everyone is entering. Little Princess is determined to win, but which song will she sing?
programme.title: Little Princess

programme.desc: Impish animation. Holly accidentally breaks her mum's special new teapot. Can Ben help her repair it?
programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

programme.subtitle: Hats
programme.desc: Mr Fussy visits Miss Magic's shop in search of the perfect headgear. Mr Stubborn goes for a dangerous drive in an oversized bonnet.
programme.title: Mr Men

programme.desc: A look ahead to today's children's programmes, including competitions and dedications.
programme.title: Milkshake

programme.subtitle: Thomas and the Rubbish Train
programme.desc: Train fun. Thomas is working with Whiff the Rubbish Engine today, but how can he freshen up later to take the Duchess of Boxford to tea?
programme.title: Thomas and Friends

programme.desc: Hold on to Your Hat Noddy. Join Noddy and his friends in Toytown as Noddy is trying to plan a surprise party for Big Ears, who isn't very happy, but the weather is just too windy.
programme.title: Make Way For Noddy

programme.desc: Garden fun. Stingo dispatches Slugsy to steal Fifi's jelly. Slugsy starts to play with the twins and forgets what he set out to do, much to Stingo's wrath!
programme.title: Fifi and The Flowertots

programme.subtitle: Lunch
programme.desc: Pig tales. When the family goes to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house for dinner, George is reluctant to eat his salad.
programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.desc: Animated series about a lovable little pig. Peppa and family go camping, but soon realise that their tent is too small for everyone to fit in.
programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.subtitle: Roary and Nigel
programme.desc: Peter Kay & Sir Stirling Moss provide the voices in another episode of the animated series. Roary brings Nigel the crab back from the beach. But things go wrong when Nigel disappears.
programme.title: Roary The Racing Car

programme.subtitle: World Tour
programme.desc: Animation. Camembert tells the Bananas about her dream to travel to the pyramids and ride on a camel. B1 and B2 find a way to bring the pyramids to Cuddlestown.
programme.title: Bananas In Pyjamas
